Is the Pope gay?

You know, that is actually a really great question!

With regards to the hot-button, politically-charged topic of ‚Äúsame sex attraction‚Äù, or more appropriately ‚Äúsexual and gender diversity‚Äù, one has to wonder:

Where does Pope Francis rank on the Kinsey scale?!

Well, We The Queer Catholic Community have conducted thorough research into the matter.

After thousands of conversations, ethnographic studies, literature review, in-depth study of the Catechism of the Catholic Church, our expert opinion is that:

It really doesn‚Äôt matter.

Sexual and gender diversity do not inform dignity. They do not affect worth. They do not determine fate. They do not inspire evil.

Sexual and gender diversity do not take away our ability to live lives through which we seek to treat our neighbors as ourselves.

Go forth and learn:

  • Many queer Catholics live abundant, healthy, and fulfilling lives as members of vibrant Churches all around the world.

  • Imposing your theology on the lives of others can be unintentionally harmful, dangerous, and deadly.

  • Are you trying to come to terms with a family member or friend who has come out to you? Reach out to Vine & Fig, Queer Theology, Q Christian Fellowship or New Ways Ministry. It could save your relationship, as well as their life.

Mark 12:30-31 makes it easy.
